title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1154.8 - Credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1154.8 - Credit

State Regulations

All charges due to the authority for the use of terminals
shall be payable in cash unless credit arrangements satisfactory to the
authority have been made in advance or permission has been secured for payment
by check. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1154.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
